item.title: The journal of debug lightty access log not appending
item.description: What I learned Why O_APPEND is needed: multiple process write the same file fcntl(fd, F_SETFL, O_NONBLOCK); It will clear all file status flags firstly. UML: user mode linux With it, we could GDB linux system call. CSDN: UML(User Mode Linux) – built binaries 阿里云: User mode Linux – self generate SYSTEM call If fcntl() is called, file flags will be cleared and set with the new arg
